about_the_game:
REALMS OF WAR GAME STORY

In a land that once knew peace, everything has changed. The arrival of ruthless invaders has plunged the world into chaos, where fear and uncertainty now reign. The serenity that once filled the air has been torn away, replaced by an all-consuming darkness that leaves little room for hope.

As the invaders push forward, the people realize that they stand alone—no heroes will descend from the heavens to save them. The once-thriving land now echoes with the sounds of battle as warriors rise from the shadows, ready to defend their home at any cost.

In this unforgiving new reality, survival means facing the invaders head-on. It's not just about defending the land but about unleashing hidden powers and forging alliances in the heat of battle. Every choice, every shot fired, carries the weight of the world’s future.

Some will fight for personal survival, mastering their abilities to stay alive in this brutal new world. Others will rise to the challenge, rallying others to their cause and becoming the unexpected champions their world desperately needs. The battlefield is where destinies are forged, where every decision can lead to triumph or doom.

This is your fight—a battle for survival in a world on the brink of collapse. Will you stand alone, mastering your skills to outlast the enemy? Or will you join forces with others, becoming part of the resistance that seeks to reclaim the world from the brink of destruction? The time has come to take up arms, face your enemies, and carve out your place in a world where only the strongest will survive.

What is R.O.W?
Introducing R.O.W: An Exciting Multiplayer First-Person Shooter Game!

Experience the thrill of intense multiplayer action with R.O.W. This action-packed game offers endless entertainment as players engage in fierce competitions individually or team up for a strategic advantage. Get ready to embark on thrilling missions with the ultimate goal of achieving victory. Join the excitement and dominate the battlefield in R.O.W!

Multiplayer Game Modes
Conquest – Control the area with your team to earn points over time. The more areas your team controls, the faster your team earns points.
Capture the flag – Capture the enemy flag and bring it to your base to earn points. If the enemy team captures your flag, you’ll need to retrieve it first to capture theirs.
Rush – Destroy or defend the objectives. If the attacker team runs out of reinforcement, the defender team wins.
Team Deathmatch – A battle royal between teams for the glory!
Free For All (Deathmatch) – A battle royal between players. The world is your oyster, so go all out and be victorious.
Kill Confirmed – Kill players from the opposing team and collect their dog tags to earn points. You can also collect dog tags from your team to deny points to the enemy team.
The game is free to play. However, staying alive will be challenging.

Each character has a unique skill set to handle specific (or multiple) weapons.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, typically considered mature content such as graphic violence, frequent nudity, sexual content, and other mature topics.

name: Realms Of War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10/ Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 3250 3.5 GHz or Intel Pentium G4560 3.5 GHz / AMD FX-4350 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: ROW Realms of War, the ultimate First Person Shooter! Leave your legacy, encounter epic battles, and shape your path. It's all free – become the champion it needs. Let's play!
